name: Ruger on the Run
description:
Ruger is a newly adopted dog who is just trying to make friends with others at his local dog park. When he finally meets a dog there, of course it has to be a bulldog who might as well be part of a pyramid scheme. "Hey girl! Looking for more ladies interested in being a boss babe!" is no match for what Ruger experiences in this visual novel. Love, chaos, Italian seasoning... it's all here in this game.

All proceeds for this game during the first month of release will go to The Guernsey County Dog Shelter in celebration of Dogust 2022.
